summary: Broadcom Inc. is an American company that designs and makes products like computer chips and software. These products are used in many areas, such as data centers, networking, and broadband. Most of their money comes from selling chips. The company is led by Tan Hock Eng and is based in California. It was formed after Avago Technologies bought Broadcom Corporation in 2016. In 2023, Broadcom bought VMware for $69 billion. The EU has also taken action against Broadcom for unfair business practices.
title: Broadcom
